name: Autumn Shift
description:
Seasons don't change on their own! Play as a fairy who is responsible for re-decorating. You'll have two minutes to make changes to the scene in a park, manually, by flying around the scene as a fairy character. Re-color the trees with magical paint, shake leaves, and more! You can even use unorthodox color schemes since, well, this is fairy magic after all and you've only got two minutes! Would humans really notice?...

Nahhhh!

--------------------------------

Diversifier used: What’s on the Menu? - includes a menu to start the game, view credits, etc.

If you have any questions or feedback, please leave a comment on this page!
